languages.text: "Даже в послушницы {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Адепта Сороритас{/g} попадают лишь достойнейшие. Те же, кто принял обеты и стал полноправной сестрой — лучшие из лучших, прошедшие испытания тела и духа. Да, случается, что сестры оступаются или проявляют слабость. Но не думай, что ты сейчас услышишь от меня историю низости или падения".

"Even the novices of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} are drawn from among the most worthy. Those who have taken the vows and become a full-fledged sister are the best of the best, tested by trials of body and spirit. Yes, there have been cases when a sister stumbled or showed weakness. But do not expect to hear a story of depravity or downfall from me."
languages.original_text: "Даже в послушницы {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Адепта Сороритас{/g} попадают лишь достойнейшие. Те же, кто принял обеты и стал полноправной сестрой — лучшие из лучших, прошедшие испытания тела и духа. Да, случается, что сестры оступаются или проявляют слабость. Но не думай, что ты сейчас услышишь от меня историю низости или падения".

traits.locale_text: "Even the novices of the Adepta Sororitas are accepted from among the worthiest. Those who have taken the vows and become a full-fledged Sister are the best of the best, tested by trials of body and spirit. Yes, there have been cases when a Sister stumbled or showed weakness. But do not expect to hear from me a story of depravity or downfall."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “即便是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修女会{/g}的新兵，也都是从最优秀的那些人中挑选出来的。至于那些许下誓言，成为修女会正式成员的人，她们都是精英中的精英，都通过了肉体与精神的双重考验。没错，确实有少数修女表现出了软弱态度，或是踏上了歧途，但别以为我会犯下这样的堕落与罪行。”
languages.original_text: "Even the novices of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} are drawn from among the most worthy. Those who have taken the vows and become a full-fledged sister are the best of the best, tested by trials of body and spirit. Yes, there have been cases when a sister stumbled or showed weakness. But do not expect to hear a story of depravity or downfall from me."

traits.locale_text: “即便是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修女会{/g}的新兵，也都是从最优秀的那些人中挑选出来的。至于那些许下誓言，成为修女会正式成员的人，她们都是精英中的精英，都通过了肉体与精神的双重考验。没错，确实有少数修女表现出了软弱态度，或是踏上了歧途，但别以为我会犯下这样的堕落与罪行。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Even the novices of the Adepta Sororitas are drawn from among the most worthy. Those who have taken the vows and become a full-fledged sister are the best of the best, tested by trials of body and spirit. Yes, there have been cases when a sister stumbled or showed weakness. But do not expect to hear a story of depravity or downfall from me."

languages.text: «Incluso las novicias del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} se eligen de entre las más fieles. Las que llegan a prestar juramento y convertirse en hermanas de pleno derecho son las mejores de las mejores, habiendo superado pruebas de su cuerpo y su alma. Es cierto que algunas hermanas han tropezado o mostrado debilidad, pero no seré yo quien narre historias de su depravación o su caída».
languages.original_text: "Even the novices of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} are drawn from among the most worthy. Those who have taken the vows and become a full-fledged sister are the best of the best, tested by trials of body and spirit. Yes, there have been cases when a sister stumbled or showed weakness. But do not expect to hear a story of depravity or downfall from me."

traits.locale_text: «Incluso las novicias del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} se eligen de entre las más fieles. Las que llegan a prestar juramento y convertirse en hermanas de pleno derecho son las mejores de las mejores, habiendo superado pruebas de su cuerpo y su alma. Es cierto que algunas hermanas han tropezado o mostrado debilidad, pero no seré yo quien narre historias de su depravación o su caída».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修道聖女会{/g}においては修練生でさえ、最もふさわしい者の中から選ばれるのだ。誓願を立てて一人前のシスターになった者は、肉体と精神の試練によって磨かれた最高の者たちだ。たしかに、シスターが挫けたり、弱さを示したケースもある。だが、私から堕落や転落の話を聞こうとは思わないでもらいたい」
languages.original_text: "Even the novices of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} are drawn from among the most worthy. Those who have taken the vows and become a full-fledged sister are the best of the best, tested by trials of body and spirit. Yes, there have been cases when a sister stumbled or showed weakness. But do not expect to hear a story of depravity or downfall from me."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修道聖女会{/g}においては修練生でさえ、最もふさわしい者の中から選ばれるのだ。誓願を立てて一人前のシスターになった者は、肉体と精神の試練によって磨かれた最高の者たちだ。たしかに、シスターが挫けたり、弱さを示したケースもある。だが、私から堕落や転落の話を聞こうとは思わないでもらいたい」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Selbst die Novizinnen der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} werden nur aus den Würdigsten ausgewählt. Jede, die den Eid geleistet und zur vollwertigen Schwester geworden ist, gehört zu den Besten der Besten und wurde körperlichen und mentalen Prüfungen unterzogen. Ja, es ist schon vorgekommen, dass eine Schwester stolperte oder eine Schwäche zeigte. Doch erwartet nicht, von mir eine Geschichte der Verderbtheit oder des Untergangs zu hören."
languages.original_text: "Even the novices of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} are drawn from among the most worthy. Those who have taken the vows and become a full-fledged sister are the best of the best, tested by trials of body and spirit. Yes, there have been cases when a sister stumbled or showed weakness. But do not expect to hear a story of depravity or downfall from me."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst die Novizinnen der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} werden nur aus den Würdigsten ausgewählt. Jede, die den Eid geleistet und zur vollwertigen Schwester geworden ist, gehört zu den Besten der Besten und wurde körperlichen und mentalen Prüfungen unterzogen. Ja, es ist schon vorgekommen, dass eine Schwester stolperte oder eine Schwäche zeigte. Doch erwartet nicht, von mir eine Geschichte der Verderbtheit oder des Untergangs zu hören."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Même les novices de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} sont sélectionnées parmi les plus dignes. Celles qui ont prononcé leurs vœux et sont devenues des sœurs en bonne et due forme sont les meilleures qui soient, le corps et l'esprit déjà forgés par les épreuves surmontées. Oui, il est déjà arrivé qu'une sœur vacille ou fasse preuve de faiblesse. Mais ne vous attendez pas à la moindre histoire de dépravation me concernant. »
languages.original_text: "Even the novices of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} are drawn from among the most worthy. Those who have taken the vows and become a full-fledged sister are the best of the best, tested by trials of body and spirit. Yes, there have been cases when a sister stumbled or showed weakness. But do not expect to hear a story of depravity or downfall from me."

traits.locale_text: « Même les novices de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} sont sélectionnées parmi les plus dignes. Celles qui ont prononcé leurs vœux et sont devenues des sœurs en bonne et due forme sont les meilleures qui soient, le corps et l'esprit déjà forgés par les épreuves surmontées. Oui, il est déjà arrivé qu'une sœur vacille ou fasse preuve de faiblesse. Mais ne vous attendez pas à la moindre histoire de dépravation me concernant. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas'ın{/g} talebeleri dahi bu makama en yaraşır bulunanlardan seçilir. Bunlardan en iyileri, yeminlerini edip rahibeliğe başlar. Bu kişiler, bedenî ve ruhani imtihanlarla sınanır. Kabul, bazı durumlarda rahibelerin tökezlediği yahut zayıflık gösterdiği olur. Fakat benim ağzımdan âcizlik veya mahvoluş hikâyeleri duyamazsın."
languages.original_text: "Even the novices of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} are drawn from among the most worthy. Those who have taken the vows and become a full-fledged sister are the best of the best, tested by trials of body and spirit. Yes, there have been cases when a sister stumbled or showed weakness. But do not expect to hear a story of depravity or downfall from me."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}'ın talebeleri dahi en önde gelenlerden seçilir. Bunlardan en iyileri, yeminlerini edip rahibeliğe başlarlar. Bu kişiler bedenî ve ruhanî imtihanlarla sınanmıştır. Bazı durumlarda rahibelerin tökezlediği yahut zayıflık gösterdiği olmuştur, kabul. Fakat benim ağzımdan acizlik veya mahvoluş hikâyeleri duyamazsın."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
